testsuite.name: application.ExitChatUseCaseTest

testcase.name: should not throw exception if user is not logged in()
should remove connection, remove user from chatrooms and from system if user was logged in and in chat rooms()

testsuite.system-out:
DEBUG ---> User bruno registered successfully DEBUG ---> User bruno logged in to the system DEBUG ---> [IRCServer] 2020-10-25T16:02:32.612408368 - bruno has joined channel pornoduro
DEBUG ---> [IRCServer] 2020-10-25T16:02:32.612775386 - bruno has joined channel pecadorr
DEBUG ---> [IRCServer] 2020-10-25T16:02:32.613171238 - bruno has left the system
